notification_updates_message.message: No action is requiredâ€”continue browsing the web without annoying ads! See what's new

updates_subtitle.message: We think you'll like the latest updates.

updates_update_i2_description.message: You can now visit websites in other languages and still have the ads blocked. When you visit a website in a specific language, you will be able to choose whether you want to block ads on all websites in that language. You can turn this option on/off in Settings > General > Language filter lists. The option is already available for our users on Chrome, Firefox and Microsoft Edge and is soon coming to Opera as well.

updates_update_i2_title.message: Added notification option for available language filters

updates_update_i2_image.message: "Notify me of available language filters" is highlighted in the "Language" section of the options page.

updates_update_i3_description.message: When you open the Adblock Plus menu from your toolbar icon, you'll see a new redesigned footer. From here, you can easily access interesting links to get more out of your product. Get support from the Help Center, get in touch with us on social media and more!

updates_update_i3_title.message: Added quick access links to the menu footer

updates_update_i4_description.message: If you're frequently adding custom filters to ABP, you'll now see more clear error messages if there's any issues. We hope this helps!

updates_update_f1_description.message: We've updated our wording in order to use allowlist moving forward.

updates_update_f2_description.message: You will now be notified when some filters in the downloadable filter lists are turned off so that you can re-enable them at your convenience.

updates_update_f2_title.message: Add option to re-enable filters in downloadable filter lists

updates_update_f3_description.message: We've updated the link behind the "Rate it" button on Microsoft Edge so that it points to the correct add-ons store.

updates_update_f3_title.message: Fixed wrong link behind the "Rate it" button
